allow:
Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\wgadb\\source\\repos\\T16O\\sql\\shred\\_theGuide\\_build_all" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix address_type classification for pool vaults and pools

- Reclassify token_account_X_X fields as ''vault'' instead of ''ata''
  \(these are pool liquidity accounts, not user ATAs\)
- Add PHASE 1e to reclassify owner_2 as ''pool'' when amm_id is present
- Add migration script to fix existing misclassified addresses

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\wgadb\\source\\repos\\T16O\\sql\\shred\\_theGuide\\_build_all" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix cascade request_id to derive from parent for traceability

Cascade requests now derive request_id from source_request_id instead
of generating new UUIDs. Format: {source_request_id}-batch{N}-{target}

This enables full request chain tracing in tx_request_log.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:\\Users\\wgadb\\source\\repos\\T16O\\sql\\shred\\_theGuide\\_build_all" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Preserve original request_id through cascade chain

- Cascade requests now use the original source_request_id instead of
  generating derived IDs, allowing callers to query status by their
  original request_id
- Updated /api/status/{request_id} to aggregate results by worker,
  returning per-worker status, counts, and individual batch records
- The target_worker field differentiates stages in the pipeline

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
